resources.string: This is a demonstration of bridging Google Chat to Matrix through a client-side app. Please use a test account to avoid data loss/corruption.

"To get started, you'll need to authenticate with Google Chat. Click the button below to send the login URL to yourself and open it on a desktop computer. 

Once open, log in normally and wait until you get to a loading screen. Press F12 on that screen to get to developer tools then visit the Application or Storage tab. 

Expand "Cookies" and select "https://accounts.google.com", find the "oauth_code" row and double click on the value. 

Copy the value here and press "Continue". "
That oauth code didn\'t work - try again?
